name: Football National Manager
description:
******************
FREE FULL GAME
NO ADS
******************

Manage your career as a national soccer manager and win all the trophies!

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

In Football National Manager, you will start your career at the head of a nation of low reputation. But improve your team, select the right players and make the right choices during games and the doors of the greatest nations will open to you.

Your ultimate goal: to win all the biggest trophies with your national teams!
- - - - - - - - - - - - -

ALL ASPECTS OF NATIONAL TEAM LIFE

Player selection:
Supervise your country's players, analyze their performance and build the best team.

Team cohesion:
Consider the relationships between your players and ensure that you maintain a high level of team cohesion. This aspect is essential to perform on the pitch.

Manage day-to-day events:
A player who lets loose on social networks, a delay in training, an argument between players, anything can happen. It's up to you to know how to react to keep your group in the best conditions.

National Federation:
The president of your national federation has confidence in you. But don't disappoint him or he may terminate your contract.

Change your national team and change your dimension:
Having good results with your team will allow you to attract the biggest soccer nations and hope to win the biggest competitions.

Qualifications and competitions:
Every competition, continental or international, takes place after a qualification phase. Every nation in the world has a chance to play in the major competitions, but the road is sometimes long.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

A COMPLETE SIMULATION

4500 players from 1800 clubs.
191 nations from all over the world.
26 competitions in 5 continents.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

SO, READY TO BECOME A WORLD SOCCER LEGEND?
